Hi,
First of all thanks for the new version and the updates in it. Its a lo=
t
helpful for me.
I am configuring and running heritrix 3.1.0 through User-=
Interface right
now for crawling different seeds.
We are trying to automate=
 the process of crawling, so that once we have
a seeds text file the crawl =
job starts automatically. To do that i need
to use heritrix through command=
 line so that i can run, stop and  pause
heritrix through command line. I c=
ame across these resources 
(http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#cmdlinecon=
trol
<http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#cmdlinecontrol>  ) ,
(http://craw=
ler.archive.org/cmdline-jmxclient/)  
<http://crawler.archive.org/cmdline-j=
mxclient/> and  when trying to read
about those articles i am not able to f=
ind the jmx jar file in heritrix
3.1.0 and the website (http://crawler.arch=
ive.org/cmdline-jmxclient/
<http://crawler.archive.org/cmdline-jmxclient/> =
) is update last in 2006
has no specifications for the usage in 3.1.0
1)Can=
 you please tell me how to operate heritrix through command line in
the rec=
ent version ?
2) If the "cmdline-jmxclient" is still in operation in heritr=
ix 3.1.0,
can you please point me to the resource or any kind of documentat=
ion or
any previous yahoo question that is answered.
I searched for the gro=
ups if this kind of question for heritrix 3.1.0
was answered before but i d=
id not find any.
Thank you very much
RegardsKiran
